1.name: Hold Portal
1.description: Prevents a touched door or portal from opening by any means unless destroyed or dispelled.

1.name: Light
1.description: Causes a target to emit light equivalent to a torch for a 20 ft radius.

1.name: Purify Food & Drink
1.description: Purifies food and water for up to 12 people, removing spoilage, poison, and impurities.

1.name: Stupor
1.description: Puts targets into deep sleep; affects number of targets based on Hit Dice.

2.name: Hold Person
2.description: Target 1d4 individuals (or one at -2 Save); targets cannot move or speak if they fail Save.

2.name: Invisibility
2.duration: Until dispelled or attack is made
2.description: Renders caster invisible to sight and sensors; ends if an attack is made.

2.name: Levitate
2.description: Allows vertical movement only; up to 20 ft per level.

2.name: Phantasmal Force
2.description: Creates a believable illusion that causes real effects if believed.

3.name: Alter Time
3.description: Speed or slow time in a 60 ft radius. 4d6 targets affected. Speed: double; Slow: half, Save negates.

3.name: Dispel Effect
3.description: Ends any active Meditation or Gift in range.

3.name: Fly
3.description: Caster can fly at 120 ft per round. Duration rolled secretly by Referee.

3.name: Invisibility II
3.duration: Until dispelled or attack is made
3.description: Grants invisibility to a target and a 10 ft radius around them. Ends when attacking.
